text: I vest my said Executrix and substitute respectively with full power and authority to sell, transfer, encumber, mortgage, invest or otherwise dispose of any and all of my property, real or personal, which I may own at the time of my death, and to do every other act and thing necessary or appropriate for the complete administration of my estate.

texts: full power and authority to sell, transfer, encumber, mortgage, invest or otherwise dispose of any and all of my property, real or personal, which I may own at the time of my death
do every other act and thing necessary or appropriate for the complete administration of my estate
the complete administration of my estate
